p:
In terms of the total energy consumption, the shares of wind and solar increased rapidly in the studied period. From 1990 to 2017, the total wind and solar energy consumption increased from 81 to 375 ktoe, as revealed by IEA (2020) data, which represents an increase of 363%. Figure 2 presents the energy consumption in Australia for the researched period based on the fuel types used.Fig. 2
Australia’s total energy consumption based on the fuel types over 1990–2017
